title: Ai Monogatari: 9 Love Stories
synopsis: An OVA based on the work of Kawaguchi Kaiji consisting of nine independent stories, each animated by a different director. With Beatles music involved, somewhere.
staff: [['Morimoto, Kouji', ['Co-Director']], ['Hamasaki, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design', ' Key Animation']], ['Mochizuki, Tomomi', ['Director']], ['Hamatsu, Mamoru', ['Director']]]
